department.dept_long_name: Committee on Higher Degrees in Biostatistics

course.title: Analysis of Multivariate and Longitudinal Data
course.meeting_text: Tu., Th., 10:30–12:20, and a weekly 90-minute lab.
course.description: The multivariate normal distribution, Hotelling's T2, MANOVA, repeated measures, the multivariate linear model, random effects and growth curve models, generalized estimating equations, multivariate categorical outcomes, missing data, computational issues for traditional and new methodologies.
course.notes: Offered jointly with the School of Public Health as BIO245.
